hero_image.alt: Hero image for Working at Height Permit Requirements Victoria: The Definitive 2026 Compliance & Digital Safety Guide

image_prompt: A photo-realistic, high-quality hero image set in a modern industrial manufacturing facility in Victoria, Australia. The scene shows a diverse team of maintenance technicians and a safety officer. One technician is wearing a full-body safety harness and hard hat, standing safely on a scissor lift platform near an overhead conveyor system. In the foreground, a safety officer (wearing a high-visibility vest and safety glasses) is holding a tablet (back of device visible only) reviewing a digital checklist with another technician. The lighting is bright and industrial. The atmosphere is professional, focused on safety and technology. No text or overlays in the image.
